passive.name: The Maiden in the Painting
passive.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. If the current HP of the target enemy is below or equal to {{2, percent}}%, increases DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by an extra <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
